title: Sual hnehchhiah hnu thlaraute u
lyrics:
Sual hnehchhiah hnu thlaraute u, 
Lalpa thu in rin chuan, 
A chawlh hahdamtir ang che u, 
Ngilnei tak a ni fan.

Aw, ring mai r'u, aw ring mai r'u, 
Aw ring mai rawh u; 
A chhandam duh, a chhandam duh, 
A ring a piang chu.

Lalpa Isuan thingah a tuar, 
Kan Lalpa thilpek hlu; 
Sual eng pawh vur aiin a var, 
A thisen sil chu.

Lalpa Isua chu kawng leh thutak, 
Chawlhna ram panna kawng; 
Chatuanin mal a lo sawmsak, 
Amah ringtute zawng.

Ram ropui lam panin pen r'u, 
He pawl thianghlim rual hian; 
Chatuan nun tawp lohna pan r'u, 
Kan Pa hnen vanah khian.
